mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member(userId, userPass, userName) values(#{userId}, #{userPass}, #{userName})
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_member where userName = #{userName}
select count(*) from tbl_member where userId = #{userId}
select userId from tbl_member where userId = #{userId} and userPass = #{userPass}
select * from tbl_member where userId=#{userId} and userPass=#{userPass}

select userPass from tbl_member where userName = #{userName} and userId = #{userId}
